test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
steps: Navigate to the Testgrid.io login page
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Create a New Project
steps: Enter a valid project name and description
test_scenarios.expected_result: New project is successfully created and listed on the dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Import Test Data Successfully
steps: Upload a valid test data file (e.g., CSV, JSON)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Test data is successfully imported and displayed in the test data section.

test_scenarios.name: Run a Test Grid Successfully
steps: Configure the test grid parameters (e.g., browsers, environments)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Test grid is successfully initiated and the status is shown as 'Running'.

test_scenarios.name: View Test Results
test_scenarios.expected_result: Test results are displayed, including pass/fail status and metrics
